" This app requires location permissions in order to provide location-aware functionality.If the permission is not granted any features that rely on such functionality may not work correctly. "

Cannot write image captured by camera.
Your device does not have front camera.
When locating the phone, the application can create an image from Google Maps

When entering your e-mail, the application sends a picture of the front camera and the location of the phone from the program\'s mail to the entered mail and for the success of the transmission process the site must be activated and for internet connection
When you open the screen lock, the process of saving the images and send them to your mail
When activating the Internet through phone data or Wi-Fi, the application can send an image from the front camera. An image from Google Maps for the phone’s location with time and date.

1. Emergency situations of all kinds, in which it is important to know the time and date of the presence of a person in a specific location. And inferred places, once the person opens the phone, the application sends a position.
2. Find out who is spying on your phone by taking a picture of who opens your phone with time and date through the place image.

3. Tracking parents for their children by installing the application on the son\'s or daughter\'s phone and hiding it by using an application to hide the applications. And at their exit times, you can know the location with the time and date every time he opens the phone.
Finally for the best use of this application and its best performance, keep in touch with the Internet and the phone location.
Front camera images and location are saved in the phone folder.(Android/data/com.horaspolice/cache/)It must be erased manually as needed
Settings must be saved from the email list for a successful transmission
You are not connected to the Internet and Location

this app not work without internet and location, that for best service.

There are so many beautiful reasons to be happy today.
Work hard and be nice to people.
Self confidence is the best outfit.
Push yourself because no one else is going to do it for you.
Set a goal that makes you want to jump out of bed in the morning.
Keep going. Everything you need will come to you at the perfect time.
Every morning you have a new opportunity to become a happier version of yourself.
Do something today that your future self will thank you for.
Kindness is free. Sprinkle that stuff everywhere.
Whatever is good for your soul…do that.
Rise up. Start fresh. See the bright opportunity in each new day.
Open your eyes and notice the beauty of this wonderful world.
Today is a beautiful day and I will attract good things into my life.
What ever you decide to do today, make sure it makes you happy.
Wake up every morning with the thought that something wonderful is about to happen.
It’s a good day to be happy.
Be you. Do you. For you.
Click again to return to the main menu
Police Android collects location data to identify android device spots, only when the lock screen app is active.\nThis data is also used to support ads.
Permission to write and read storage
This permission is used to read, write and save files within the application folder
Permission to use the front camera

The front camera is used to enable capturing a photo of whoever unlocks the phone from the app lock screen.\nAnd also permission to allow the display of the application interface to appear on top of other applications
It can only be skipped after all permissions are approved for successful installation
Interested in mobile technology and developing ideas
